name: express-security-practice
description: You're wondering how to secure your backend application with simple token? This is how we do. Without passport/auth0/jwt/openauth etc. For now without database to avoid storing tons of fake users. Just for test purpouses.

scripts.install:all: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.hotel-init: npm run hotel-init:client && npm run hotel-init:server
scripts.add-react: cd react-client && cd client && cd src && hotel add "npm start" index.js
